channel.title: [508] Making NPCs [508]
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I'm just wondering what are (If there is codes) the codes to create a custom npc, I've got things like: [code]
if(i == 7997) { class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, "War Beast");//Name class80.anInt1444 = 785;//combat level class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot? class80.anInt1439 = 0;//Set Headicon ID class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking? class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Attack"); } [/code]
But i was actually wondering, if it was possible to add the weapon/armour model id's, so you could make a man with Dragon Claws for example, I've done this before on 317, but have just stumbled accross an idea that will require me to create some custom npcs for 508, so i ask my fellow citizens of moparscape for my help. PLEASE HELP ME! kthxbai
- Tim

item.title: [508] Making NPCs [508]
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Hey Guys,

I’m just wondering what are (If there is codes) the codes to create a custom npc, I’ve got things like:


if(i == 7997)
{
    class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, "War Beast");//Name
    class80.anInt1444 = 785;//combat level
    class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot?
    class80.anInt1439 = 0;//Set Headicon ID
    class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking?
    class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Attack");
}

But i was actually wondering, if it was possible to add the weapon/armour model id’s, so you could make a man with Dragon Claws for example, I’ve done this before on 317, but have just stumbled accross an idea that will require me to create some custom npcs for 508, so i ask my fellow citizens of moparscape for my help. PLEASE HELP ME! kthxbai

  • Tim

Read full topic
